text: Hi Joanna, I’d recommend trying to get the money in your base salary first, if possible. That way you’re set to grow in the future. From there, if there’s a cap, I’d chat about a signing bonus to get you to your desired salary number. I’d phrase the ask communally, “Here is the market rate for someone with my experience. How can we find a solution that works?” You can negotiate anything, but I’d always go for money in your pocket now over shares to be vested. You can also check out my AMA here: <https://superpath.co/blog/salary-negotiation-for-content-marketers>

text:
Thanks so much <@U026R1895QV>! I'm subscribed to your newsletter and love it. I tried to find answers on your site, but it's under construction. Excited for it to go live and I'll review the AMA blog again :slightly_smiling_face:

Also helped my partner negotiate his TC by 34% yesterday because of some of your tips so TY! :fire:
